SELECT user_info_id, user_id, profile_image, birth_date, gender, nickname, phoneNumber, created_at, modified_at FROM user_info WHERE YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN #{minAge} AND #{maxAge} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND birth_date IS NOT NULL AND gender IS NOT NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10대' WHEN YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birth_date) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대 이상' END AS age_group, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_info WHERE birth_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY age_group ORDER BY age_group
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_info WHERE gender IS NOT NULL GROUP BY gender
